text: Siaosi â€˜Ofakivahafolau Sovaleni (born 28 February 1970) is a Tongan politician. He is the prime minister-designate of Tonga since 2021. From 2014 to 2017 he was Deputy Prime Minister of Tonga. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1970 births Category:Prime Ministers of Tonga
title: Siaosi Sovaleni
